data.name: XDevice
desc: provides information about a graphical output device and offers a factory for the graphics which provides write operations on the device.

methods.name: createBitmap
desc: creates a bitmap with the current device depth.
If the specified area does not lie entirely in the device, the bits outside are not specified.

methods.name: createDevice
desc: creates a new device which is compatible with this one.
If the device does not support the GETBITS device capability, this method returns NULL.

methods.name: createDisplayBitmap
desc: The data of the bitmap is in process memory instead of in the device, so that the output operation is fast.

methods.name: createGraphics
desc: creates a new graphics whose output operation is directed to this device.

methods.name: getFont
desc: returns information about a font offered by this device.

methods.name: getFontDescriptors
desc: returns the list of available font descriptors.
